description.jp: 魔導院ペリシティリウム朱雀・０組に所属するアギト候補生。命を簡単に奪う武器を嫌い 拳のみで戦う格闘少年。冷静沈着で思慮深く 個性派ぞろいの０組の中では比較的常識人である一方 負けず嫌いの熱血漢でもあり いつもストイックに鍛錬に励んでいる。
description.gl: An Agito cadet in Class 0 whose distaste for killing leads him to battle with his fists alone. Amongst the striking personalities of Class 0, his collected and thoughtful nature stands out as comparatively sensible. Also has a passionate side and hates to lose, and stoically devotes himself to his training.

jp.text: せめてオマエの痛みは\nオレの拳が覚えてやるよ……
絶望するにはまだ早い
オレたちは\nオマエたちの力で辿り着く！
これからのこと 考えてみないか
オレたち、駆け抜けたよな？
絶対 相性バッチリだと思うんだよなぁ

gl.text: Don't worry: now that my fists have felt your pain、 it'll never be forgotten.
It's still too soon to lose all hope.
Your power will take us to our future!
Let's think about what comes next.
Hey guys、 we made a good run、 right?
Yeah、 I would think we're more than a perfect match...

desc.en:
8-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200% Max BRV
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Raises BRV by 30% HP damage dealt
Inflicts [Lock] to target for 2 turns
Grants [Breakfall] for 4 turns

While [Breakfall] is active
• Prevents KO if HP is at least 50% of Max HP and leaves HP value at 1
• After taking damage or successful evasion, triggers [Counter Rush]
　∟ 8-HIT melee BRV + HP attack that ignores Defense
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

[Breakfall]
• Raises own Attack
• Extends duration of self-granted buffs
desc.gl:
8-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
All targets: 2 turns Lock
Self: 4 turns Defense
While Defense active:
 • Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1 while HP at least 50% of MAX
 • Triggers Counter Rush (8-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack that ignores DEF; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets) when attacked with BRV or HP attack or evading attack
desc.jp:
8HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分
与えるHPダメージは分配 与えたHPダメージの30％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる
対象に2ACTION「ターゲット固定」付与
自身に4ACTION「受け身」付与
「受け身」付与中 以下の効果が発動
・自身のHPが最大HPの50％以上の時
　敵の攻撃でHPダメージを受けても必ず1残る
・BRV攻撃またはHP攻撃を受けた時 または攻撃回避時
　以下の「カウンターラッシュ」が発動
　防御力無視の8HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　攻撃をした対象以外にも50％分のHPダメージ

desc.gl: Lock: Unable to switch target
desc.jp: ターゲット固定：ターゲットが変更不能になる

desc.gl: Defense: Raises own ATK; extends duration of buffs granted by self
desc.jp: 受け身：自身の攻撃力が上昇し 自身の付与する強化効果の期間延長する

desc.gl:
8-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
All targets: 5 turns Lock
Self: 6 turns Defense
While Defense active:
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt to selected target after HP attack (chained HP attacks, Explosive Fist excluded)
 • Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1 while HP at least 50% of MAX 
 • Triggers Counter Rush (8-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack that ignores DEF; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets) when attacked with BRV or HP attack or evading attack
desc.jp:

name.jp: 迅雷の型エクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Quickbolt Stance」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Extends duration of 「Quickbolt」 by 4 turns

When using 「HP Attack+」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Greatly raises total BRV potency

When using 「Lightspeed Jab」:
- Raises BRV based on Attack before attacking
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Greatly raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Inflicts 「Large Defense Down」 for 2 turns after breaking target or attacking a broken target

When using 「BRV Attack+」:
- Greatly raises total BRV potency
- Turns 「Lightspeed Jab」 into 「Lightspeed Jab+」 after breaking target or attacking a broken target
　∟ Extends the duration of current buffs by 1 turn
　∟ No Action Delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
　∟ Turns back to 「Lightspeed Jab」 after use
desc.gl:
When using Quickbolt Stance:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Quickbolt duration +4

When using HP Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage

When using Lightspeed Jab:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK, before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Inflicts 2 turns DEF Down III when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

When using BRV Attack+:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Lightspeed Jab becomes Lightspeed Jab+ after inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break (extends buffs by 1 turn; instant turn rate; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support; returns to Lightspeed Jab after use)
desc.jp:
「迅雷の型」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・「迅雷」の4ACTION期間延長

「HP攻撃＋」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ

「光速拳」使用時
・BRV攻撃前
　自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・対象ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時
　対象に2ACTION「防御力大ダウン」付与

「BRV攻撃＋」使用時
・BRV威力大アップ
・対象ブレイク後 ブレイク中攻撃後
　「光速拳」が「光速拳＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-自身に付与された強化効果を1ACTION延長する
　-行動負荷がない
　-総ACTION数に加算されない
　 召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される
　-使用後 「光速拳」に戻る
